item.description:
Note: The sign wave will happen rain or shine! We'll have plenty of plastic signs and at least a dozen ponchos just in case we get rain. And what a great way to show our dedication to the cause of Liberty and Freedom, a little bit of water isn't going to stop us.

Hamden Sign Wave and lit. Distribution

We're down to the wire here, this may be the last Ron Paul sign wave some of us ever attend! Studies show that right before a primary is when events like these have the most impact. I have made the meeting point the nearby TD Bank, as it looks to have ample parking. There are restaurants close by too, but they are either have no parking or open at 11:30 am.

Physical location for the sign wave is the intersection of Dixwell and Whitney Ave, a link to google maps is below:

http://maps.google.com/maps?oe=utf-8&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official&client=firefox-a&q=Dixwell+Ave+%26+Whitney+Ave,+Hamden,+CT+06518&um=1&ie=UTF-8&hq=&hnear=0x89e7da81079f2623...

Please bring your signs, literature and unwavering enthusiasm for Liberty. We are scheduled to wave until 3pm although these sometimes run longer so if you are in the area please stop by. You can call 860-730-3RON the day of the event to find our location and status.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the intersection of Dixwell Ave and Whitney Ave
item.name: Hamden Sign Wave and lit. Distribution
